item.title: K.Boopathi
item.description: Welcome to My World! üåç Hi! I‚Äôm K. Boopathi, a passionate Full Stack Developer with a love for tackling complex problems and staying ahead of the curve in the world of Web Development, DevOps, Generative AI, and beyond.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Over the years, I‚Äôve worked on a wide range of projects ‚Äî from weekend experiments to solutions for real-world problems. Here‚Äôs a curated list of some of my favorites: Hirezen A Chrome Extension that assists interviewers by generating AI-based, role-specific questions, capturing feedback, and exporting it as a professional PDF report for HR.

item.title: From Heroku to Kubernetes Lessons Learned in Our Migration Journey
item.description: Migrating from Heroku to Kubernetes is no small feat. While Heroku provided a straightforward Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) environment that handled many operational aspects for us, Kubernetes offers greater flexibility, scalability, and control.

item.title: Sherlock Holmes: The Case of the Invalid HeloHost Error
item.description: This time, our debugging adventure takes us deep into the world of SMTP, where an elusive Invalid HELO error threatened to derail email sending. Let‚Äôs dive in! The Mystery Begins It was a Friday evening, and I was ready to log off and enjoy the weekend.
